mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, NVL(M.PROFILE_IMG, '/images/user.png') AS profile, M.MEMBER_EMAIL FROM FOLLOW F JOIN "MEMBER" M ON F.FOLLOWED_ID = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE F.FOLLOW_ID = #{memberNo}
